title: Finishing & Refinishing Wood: Techniques & Projects for Fine Wood Finishes (Black & Decker Home Improvement Library)
features: offers inspiration and straight-to-the point instruction on how to salvage mistreated wood surfaces and turn them once again into things of beauty. Readers will learn how to effectively use new, environmentally safe strippers to remove old paints and varnishes, how to patch and repair damaged surfaces, and how to apply stains and achieve glass-smooth new finishes with no fuss. This book features the latest tools, including fine detail sanders and high velocity finish sprayers. Fifteen carefully chosen case studies show how to apply these techniques to a variety of wood projects. An entire section is devoted to spary application of stains and surface finishes - the most important new trend in the world of wood finishing.
description: The editors of Creative Publishing international are how-to experts in the fields of home repair, home improvement, home decor, sewing, crafting, hunting and fishing. They have written dozens of best-selling titles in these areas, rich with color, step-by-step photography and easy-to-follow instructions.
